channel.title: Trade Error
channel.description:
[code] java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -91 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:20254) at client.packetProcess(client.java:19075) at client.packetSending(client.java:19028) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:155) at server.main(server.java:51) Retribution Server [fatal] - exception [/code]
When I try to trade some NPC's...This error occurs on my runserver and it kicks me off. What is wrong?

item.title: Trade Error
